title: Average annual wages in Italy 2000 to 2018
summary: In general Average annual wages in euros has stayed the same over the Year.

Average annual wages in euros is gradually decreasing from 2009 to 2012, roughly constant from 2012 to 2014, slightly increasing from 2014 to 2015, roughly decreasing from 2015 to 2016, and finally roughly constant from 2016 to 2018.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2011 and 2012.
Maximum Average annual wages in euros, about 30620.0 was reported at Year 2010
The lowest Average annual wages in euros, of value 29231.0 was reported at Year 2012
